Fontawesome and icons are for the conkybar(i3status bar),
they should be copied to /usr/share/fonts/TTF/

PowerlineSymbols.otf is used by powerline and should be copied to /usr/share/fonts/
10-powerline-symbols.conf is also used by powerline, should be copied to /etc/fonts/conf.d/
Note: Remember to close all instances of terminal before the powerline works 

Fantasque Sans Mono is the general Font used by the system(Sublime, shell and so on)
The folder should be copied to /usr/share/fonts/truetype and thereafter run "fc-cache -vf"
Remember to close all instances of the shell(Terminal) to use the new selected font.
